lead_paragraph: Remi Garde parted company with Aston Villa almost five months after taking over as manager on Tuesday having failed to turn around the Premier League club's dismal season.

headline.print_headline: Villa Part Company With Manager Garde
headline.main: Villa Part Company With Manager Garde

snippet: Remi Garde parted company with Aston Villa almost five months after taking over as manager on Tuesday having failed to turn around the Premier League club's dismal season....
